name: code-development
description: 27 expert skills for software development covering architecture, code excellence, UI/UX, process engineering, auth & security, backend & databases, payment/Stripe, monitoring, DevOps, product analytics, quality & reliability, AI engineering, API design, cloud infrastructure, mobile development, web performance, frontend frameworks (React/Next.js), security testing (OWASP/SAST/DAST), web accessibility (WCAG/A11y), advanced TypeScript, testing strategies (Vitest/RTL/Pact), real-time systems (WebSockets/SSE/CRDT), GraphQL (Federation/DataLoader), distributed systems (event sourcing/CQRS/saga), caching strategies (Redis/CDN), developer tooling (Turborepo/Nx/CLI), and database advanced (migrations/partitioning/TimescaleDB).
